# @bundlenudge/worker

> Mac build worker for native iOS/Android builds.

## Purpose

Background worker that consumes build jobs from queue, executes native builds, handles code signing, and uploads artifacts.

## Key Exports

- `BuildWorker` - Main worker class
- `startWorker()` - Start worker process

## Usage

```typescript
import { BuildWorker } from '@bundlenudge/worker';

const worker = new BuildWorker({
  queueUrl: process.env.QUEUE_URL,
  signingCert: process.env.SIGNING_CERT,
});

await worker.start();
```

## File Structure

```
src/
├── index.ts          # Exports
├── worker.ts         # Main loop
├── builder.ts        # Build execution
├── signing.ts        # Code signing
└── queue.ts          # Queue consumer
```

## Code Conventions

- Max 250 lines per file
- Handle build failures gracefully
- Never log secrets
- Clean up build artifacts
